website_summaries.verdict: A cost-effective choice for buyers seeking a pack of multi-colored dog blankets.
pros: Extremely lightweight fabric great for car trips and carriers
Offers adequate warmth despite its light design
The ideal size for smaller dogs
cons: Fabric was thinner than some customers anticipated
Seams can unravel after machine washing

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my baby pug puppy. He loves them. They’re very soft and warm. I like how easy they are to wash. They hold up well too. I’ve washed these blankets a lot so far since my puppy has accidents almost daily in his kennel. They still look and feel new.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!! DO NOT BUY THESE FOR YOUR DOG CRATE
customer_reviews.text: WARNING!! DO NOT BUY THESE FOR YOUR DOG CRATE. There is an incredibly UNNECESSARY hem around the outside edge of the blanket. My dog very easily pulled a string loose and swallowed about 18 inches of it before I came home to find her still attached to the blanket (the other end in her stomach). She had so have emergency surgery to SAVE HER LIFE. A huge amount of emotional trauma and thousands of dollars in vet bills later, our dog is going to be ok. However, I would feel irresponsible if I did not share this very scary story with future buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for guinea pig enclosure
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered a set the use as bedding for our guinea pigs. Blankets are the perfect size for the enclosure. They wash and dry well and the guinea pigs have not been interested in chewing the edges (several people commented on the possibility of that in their reviews) It takes 2 of these blankets and 2 xl puppy pads for the enclosure daily, but clean up is super easy. These blankets are working so well I've already ordered another set!
customer_reviews.author: MK Hardee

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: Our office is pet friendly. I ended up buying several of these so each dog could have their own and I have them in lots of locations available to my own pet at home. Dogs love them so much our biggest problem is the office dogs snatching each others blanket. If temped by one. I don't think your dog will be disappointed. Only surprise is they are very small. But that doesn't stop the dogs from thinking they are the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: Looking for the perfect product

customer_reviews.title: My Weimaraner loves these
customer_reviews.text: I buy these to use as "binkies" for my 18-month-old Weimaraner. Since she was a puppy she loves to suck on them and knead them with her paws in the evenings or when she's stressed. I've washed them multiple times and they still look great.
customer_reviews.author: ML Bilyeu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for turn down service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these with 2 bags of food I'd forgotten in a previous order last night before I went to bed and they were delivered this morning when I woke up. How is that possible? I love the size of these. I can change the bed covers of my little piggies every day as my little boy Piggie asks for turn down service daily. Perfect for spoiled babies.
customer_reviews.author: toshwaka

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Soft Little Blankets
customer_reviews.text: These cute little blankets are just what I was looking for. I needed small blankets to put in carriers and crates for my Pom-chi and small foster dogs. They aren't thick so if there isn't a pad in the crate you will need to use a few but they are perfect for little dogs to burrow under. They're also great to throw on the couch for a small dog to lay on. There is a 5 1/2 lb chihuahua curled up under the blanket in the pic.
customer_reviews.author: D.Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Good little crate blankets! Our puppy cuddles right up in them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little puppy starter blankets! We are crate training our 8 week old puppy and I wanted to have some blankets in his bed so he would have some warmth and these are the perfect size! They are pretty light weight, and some would say flimsy, but I have washed them numerous times from the pup having accidents, and they have held up through the washer on cold/cold and the dryer on normal heat. No shrinkage at all and no loose threads! I love that I could get 6 blankets for such a great price! It makes for less time running the washing machine!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylakax3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are really sweet and perfect size for *my* needs, which is kennel blankets for my five pound Chihuahua. And for that, they're perfect. Nice quality and size, considering I fold these blankets up anyway for a type of nesting setup. I think people who are unhappy with these are buying too small for their breed. These would be ideal for cats and dogs up to ten pounds, for kennel comfort, bedding lining, or misc comfort. Larger animals than that, buy a different blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Dani reads 📚

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my guinea pigs cage after a bad bedding incident. I definitely do not regret! These are super soft and great for the cage. They're also easy to clean and are very cute. I also gave one to my dog, he loves chewing and tearing up blankets so this was great for him.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Cute blankets. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I actually got these to donate to a no kill animal shelter. My mom was attending a fund raising event and they were looking for donations of any kind. These were affordable and, even better, came in a six-pack. I opened them up before giving them to my mom and I thought they were great. If my outdoor kitties ever move indoors, they will each be getting one of these. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Schnoppie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable blankets
customer_reviews.text: Great blankets for pet beds or around the house. My cats instantly loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B

customer_reviews.title: however for our Smooth Fox terriers they are perfect! The dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: First impression was they were small and thin, however for our Smooth Fox terriers they are perfect! The dogs love them, we are in New England its winter and they don't have a lot of fur. great for lounging on the couch, or curled up in the crate. the small size is actually a plus as our dogs are 20 and 25 pounds. getting six is good to so we can rotate for wash time...
customer_reviews.author: Mike johns

customer_reviews.title: Too small of blankets
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a bigger blanket if I am being completely honest. If you are looking for that, these are not for you!! I have a large Guinea Pig enclosure and I’ll have to use three of these when I wanted to use two. Personally, wasn’t worth 15$ and I will be sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Off with their Heads!
customer_reviews.text: Well....I believed I ordered a dog blanket, Like Sheba's blue one. . I got several suitable for a ferret....maybe. (Brown one) Tiny!! Tiny!!!!. I would have been very happy if I had a ferret. Her Majesty Sheba, requires more. BUT! The softness is exactly to her taste, so pillowcases they will be. Not a total loss. She is happy, Im happy. (Her Maj is 15. And now is the time to spoil her shamelessly. 😢)
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Soft lap blanket for Guinea Pig
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the softness of these small blankets. They will be perfect for making pouches for the waterproof lap pads we have for our guinea pigs. I wish I could pick which colors I prefer but understand I'm getting a good deal by getting a variety pack. Would be lovely if I could pick and choose :) Washed well and held shape.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Perkins

customer_reviews.title: got these for our new puppy
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our new puppy during poty training to put in her crate with her. As we all know, it can take a while for puppies to stop going to the bathroom in their crates. We put 2 of these down to give her something to lay on and if she does pee on it, she just kicks it aside. and we can throw it in the wash. ive noticed a few small holes recently, not sure if it is wear and tear or if the pup has chewed a few holes in it. a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Good swaddling blankets
customer_reviews.text: This blanket set is good for swaddling kittens, puppies and maybe as a cover for small dog. They look as though they are durable and are quite soft as they are fleece. But I didn’t pay attention to the size of the blankets. I had originally bought them to use as bedding in an XL Dog kennel (used for my fosters) but they still work to my advantage and are comforting to the pets.
customer_reviews.author: Star Gray

customer_reviews.title: Nice little blankets
customer_reviews.text: These blankets are light weight, very soft, and colors are beautiful and bright. I gave them as gifts to my cat lover family members after I personalized each one. Of course I had to keep one for my own picky diva, and she snuggles right into it. Some of the edge stitching was a little loose, but it shouldn't pose a problem. These should wash and dry nicely. They fit nicely in carriers for those daring vet visits, giving the cat a familiar comfort soother.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Nappable
customer_reviews.text: Paco loves to sleep in the hammocks but I can't get them clean. With these little blankets he still gets the hammock effect and I can throw them in the washer and dryer! We're both happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: KJB

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: Wow are these tiny! Pictures are definitely deceiving! I pulled them out of the package and was quite upset for the lack of size! There isn’t enough fabric for even my Chihuahuas to snuggle under. Quite underwhelmed with this product. I bought them for the purpose of lining my guinea pigs cage in, but to my overwhelming disappointment, one blanket doesn’t even cover a third of their cage. Debating on what I should do with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: My cat Gravitate
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these blankets, they are his blankets , and we all know it, because he will let us know it , and he love using them when he goes to the doctors , there perfect size and he likes to be wrapped up in his blankets , thank you cause cat gravitate to what they like and what they don’t , they can be picky , but my cat gravitate to his blankets, so Thank You very much.😁Kathryn Reddin
customer_reviews.author: Reddin

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat them for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can't really beat them for the price. They are not big, but that was expected based on the descriptions - the size described is accurate. I wouldn't call them see-through as some reviews have - they are not as thick as a fleece blanket, but you can't expect that for the price. They are very soft and comfortable. The dog likes to lay on them. The only draw back is the stitching around the edge is pretty loose and won't last long at all. I'll end up cutting that off soon so it doesn't get eaten. But, overall, I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: ds6240

customer_reviews.title: These are terrific!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as blankets for our new mini Schnauzer pup, but she treats them as toys! She hauls them around the house and into the backyard, always looking for a game of tug of war. We still don't know how they perform as blankets, but they've stood up to her puppy biting and countless tugs of war. I highly recommend these to anyone with a hyperactive, playful puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Joenumeruno

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a kitten
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my new kitten. I just wanted something she could snuggle with and also use in the carry case. They are soft, washed well (only washed once so far--the colors did not bleed. I washed the white and red together--no problem) They are fairly thin but are perfect for what I use them for. For the price, I think they are great.
customer_reviews.author: hmdoylestown

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value! Perfect to have on hand as a foster parent!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pack of blankets for my foster kittens since I didn't have a lot of bedding supplies and they are perfect to have on hand. I use them to over the shelves or my foster kitten's enclosure. I use them to line their carrier for vet appointments and to cover their heating pad. I need to get another set of these because it feels like you can never have enough blankets for foster babies!!
customer_reviews.author: Shasta

customer_reviews.title: Love them!! The girls do too!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic for a few reasons. I normally lay out blankets where they like to sleep and lay, to protect our furniture, catch all the fur and provide them a soft comfy place to sleep. Now I can take back my "people" blankets and give the ladies (2 cats) their own blankets. I now have enough perfectly sized blankets, which allows me to rotate them in between washing them. I gently use the furminator brush to take off the fur and throw them in the wash. They took to them right away. I absolutely will order more in case they find new places to sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Mattie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I love the print and colors. It's a thinner blanket but not too thin. I use with my chihuahua and use two, One for the bottom of his bed and the other over top of him. He sleeps under the blanky. The price is great because there was a time when he threw up on his bed and since they are a low price I just tossed it, no need to try and wash. I will definitely be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Breivik

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I should not complain as these were CHEAP. But they are also very cheaply made, extremely thin, flimsy and small in size. I am using two of these in a carrier as one would be totally ridiculous - like a sheet of tissue paper or just slightly thicker. I definitely am not pleased and will not purchase again. I had been making my own and I will look elsewhere or continue to make my own little fleece Koverlets I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Marva

customer_reviews.title: They’re smaller than I thought. Perfect for a small puppy though
customer_reviews.text: I may have overlooked the size but they were a little smaller than I thought they’d be. I bought a pack of these for a new puppy and they were perfect for wrapping him up or keeping him warm for a few weeks. He outgrew them pretty fast. Not the most durable especially when you have a puppy that loves to chew on things. They rip pretty easily but are very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: iEdwin00

customer_reviews.title: Small, lightweight(caution with puppies and chewers)
customer_reviews.text: These are what I expected. Small, lightweight blankets. I put several on top of my chihuahua mixes bedding or 1 in her carrier bag or one in her car booster seat so she has her smell from home without the bulk of a big blanket. If you are looking for bedding or warmth this won't be the best choice. My only critique is the large looped thread stitching on the outer seams. It appears to be decorative yet it's a potential hazard for a puppy or mischievous pooch who likes to chew or play with their blankets. So buyer beware and manufacturer consider changing that aspect and I would most likely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie f

customer_reviews.title: Fine for protecting furniture for hair.
customer_reviews.text: It is not super plush as in what one would expect to find in fleece which usually has two sides you can use. The price is way too high for the quality of fleece you are getting and the edging barely made it through the first wash and it was already fraying. I don't know how this would work for a dog without hair to keep warm. It would keep hair off furniture at the most. The price for the thin though cute design is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nizza

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found these! Love them
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these and will be buying more!!! I put my pups name on it and he loves laying on it! It's a pretty decent size not huge but I don't feel there too small either definitely soft even my daughter lays with my pup's blanket. So glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Oh well...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought something else. Sooooooo small and tiny. Not great. Meant for infant dogs or pets. If you have a hamster who needs a blanket, this would be good for that. Needed this for small dogs. I have a business and this did not work at all. So tiny! Wish I could have gotten my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Raja Magic

customer_reviews.title: For the low price these are great
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect thick fleece like you would pay $12 per yard for and you won't be disappointed. These are really thin and cheaply made but I got what I expected for the price. I am using to make toys and fluffs for my hedgehog and these are perfect for that!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Orvis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small compact dice for small pets & children’s Dribbles and drools..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size fit small puppy or kitten covering of your chairs laps arm rests needs lint brushing and soft but not smooth velour feel . covering for Hair’s and dribbles and droolsfor any agar boy girls and pets too.. troubles small size that does a great job for lazy fat thighs
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Theses are like napkins not bed covering
customer_reviews.text: My originall review was slightly more forgiving. These are like napkins not appropriate for pet beds! After two of my cats have slept on them they are crumpled up to one side after shifting in the night. They are also very thin, like napkins. Don’t bother unless your pet is very tiny.
customer_reviews.author: L Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to chew on EVERYTHING and loves to toss her blankets all over. I purchased these as they are inexpensive, are relatively soft and just the right size. Right now, the 2 she has out are about ready to be toss as she's chewed holes in them. I would reorder again based on the price.
customer_reviews.author: Denise E.

customer_reviews.title: Soft but small
customer_reviews.text: Well I can’t say if they’re durable are you easy to clean since I just got him this moment but I can tell you they are tiny I expected them bigger I guess I could’ve read the dimensions but I just kind of expected them to be the same size as other small pet these these are kind of tiny
customer_reviews.author: ddalberg

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are alright. I hate that they have the stupid string around the edges. There is no point to it at all and I have to go through and cut it off, which is time consuming and tedious. It’s incredibly dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Donated to local Animal Shelter
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered and delivered to our local animal shelter. I can’t personally give a review on them. However, they were one of the items on their wish list. I’m delighted they have a wish list posted so those of us in the community are able to donate exactly what they need whenever we can.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Hall

customer_reviews.title: A very nice buy
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I purchased these blankets. They are lightweight and cute. I used them for traveling (to lay under my dog if she is on my lap), to cover up with, to place on her cot for extra softness, and for in the bike carrier. They are easy to throw in the laundry if they get messy, and came with plenty in order to do so. I have actually only used 3 of the 6 so far and will probably give donate the other 3 to our local shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Softer than I thought they would be
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for our guinea pig cages, worried that they might be the low quality fleece that is rough and scratchy. I was very happy to discover that they are really soft and well made. Make sure when you order that you take into account their size. They aren't very big, and are made to seem larger in the picture featured. Despite their size, I was so happy with the quality that I actually ordered a second set.
customer_reviews.author: jjcrazycat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and super soft. Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my little baby conure. He loves nuzzling and rolling around in it. The stitches on the sides are a little loose so he keep picking at them but these blankets are absolutely perfect for a puppy or a kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki A

customer_reviews.title: Wash well
customer_reviews.text: These have been great as guinea pig cage liners! SHake them out, wash them, ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lambert-Greer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and my rats love them!
customer_reviews.text: My young male rats really love these blankies! They are soft and a nice size, colors and print. I give them 3 at a time. Two of them cover the cage floor and one is for them to play with and put where they want it. I've purchased this package three times and may even buy more. I don't get to the laundromat all that often so I need a lot of them. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K.

customer_reviews.title: very soft blankets
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these so when the puppies went to their forever homes, they would have a comfy blanket that had the scent of the mother and siblings. These were our 3rd and final purchase of the same blankets. Everyone loved them(Puppies, Puppy human parents, my wife and I)
customer_reviews.author: Cha0tic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for inside a crate. Soft yet durable.
customer_reviews.text: These are small but perfect for inside of a crate. I’m glad to have multiple of them for the puppy potty/ crate training phase. They are great quality and soft fabric. Very worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jopek

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Small, but mighty. Purchased for the local pup shelter. They will certainly be loved!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Stickan

customer_reviews.title: THE SIZE OF A HAND TOWEL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to send home to the new owners of our Lab Puppies as comfort blankets. I should have paid better attention to the size. I was expecting these to be like the cheap $2.50 fleece blankets at Walmart that are like 50" x 60". These are actually the size of a small hand towel. These will work for a small pet taxi or small dogs, just not for Lab Pups.
customer_reviews.author: KIM J

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT, WONDERFUL PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I VOLUNTEER AT AN ANIMAL SHELTER. I MAKE UP "STARTER KITS" FOR SPECIAL NEEDS/HARD TO PLACE KITTENS & CATS. I PAY FOR EVERYTHING IN THEM MYSELF. THESE BLANKETS ARE PERFECT - SO PRETTY & USEFUL AND AT A PRICE I CAN AFFORD! THANKS SO MUCH!
customer_reviews.author: samd

customer_reviews.title: Sweet small plush 'baby' animal blankets 🍼
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to send home with kittens. It is always nice to have something with familiar smells of litter mates, mother, human mommy, and household, to help with transition to new environment. Will continue to buy. I feel they are a bit pricey, but this did not stop me from buying. Kitties love to lay on them - soft, plush, snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Rambonrse

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and warm
customer_reviews.text: All five of our cats like the texture of these lightweight blankets. We like how easy they are to clean and versatility - use them in the house and in outdoor cat enclosures.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Size 39”x31” Was Great!
customer_reviews.text: Size 39”x31” can be folded to provide some nice cushion for your small pet. I got these for my cat beds as an extra layer. I washed them in cold wster after arrival and came out with no smell, no damage. Happy with the purchase. See my photos.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: If what you are looking for is the size of a bandana and the thick mess of a napkin, this garbage is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Handy to carry everywhere! Just the right size for car or rainy walks! Puppy loves to curl up on them in her favorite resting places. I wash on delicate cycle. Have purchased two bags of these and one blanket from each bag had had the stitching on the outer edges come out on regular wash cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Peg C.

customer_reviews.title: Awww...we love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable and soft and they wash and wear well...we use them mostly in the car for our little pup to keep him nice and comfy, and cozy if it’s chilly. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Namelia

customer_reviews.title: For the wee pee’er in your life!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a miniature dachshund. She has a hard time walking and cannot always make it to her pee pad, so we wash A lot of her blankets. These are great, cheap, warm, and you get 6 of them! I only wish they were a little bit larger, then they’d be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: S E P

customer_reviews.title: Thin!  Too thin!
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t know how many stars to give this product, I never opened it up. I could tell they were way too thin for what I was needing for my dog. So returned.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3wifeof1:)

customer_reviews.title: Soft to my babies fur.
customer_reviews.text: I received the blankets my dogs loves them and they are soft, easy to wash. The blankets are holding up without fading or tearing apart.. 6 total blankets..
customer_reviews.author: LisaEastCoastGurl

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR $!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. These are literally smaller than small-sized infant receiving blankets. You can get the regular “throw” size at Walmart for the same cost. Virtually disposable tiny “blankets” to fit a small pet taxi or doll blankets.
customer_reviews.author: StephJC

customer_reviews.title: Small but durable
customer_reviews.text: Small! (My fault for not reading the whole description) I realized as soon as I opened the package my dog (60lb. Pit bull)is too large to fit under these blankets. My daughter tied knots in them and they are now tug of war ropes. For that reason I have to say they are very durable!
customer_reviews.author: just-a-girl

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my dog crates. I fold one (or more) on top of the bed inside their crates for comfort and warmth. They are easy to wash and are durable.
customer_reviews.author: Butter Pecan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We used these when our American bully was give birth and they work great thank you so much we will be stock up for our next round pup at birth and now at 12 weeks
customer_reviews.author: midnighttrainbullieskennel

customer_reviews.title: Pet blanket
customer_reviews.text: The blanket has a very cute design of paw prints. The edging is well sewn. I would recommend these blankets for a very small dog only. My dog id 11lbs 10 oz. On her doggy bed she turns these blankets into a wad, probably because the bed is larger than she needs. I did not star durability because i have not laundered them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L ONeal

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves Them.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them. He drags his blanket around the house until he finds a comfortable spot and he's there for hours. Just a dog with his blanket.
customer_reviews.author: J N L

customer_reviews.title: Great for my guinea pigs log cabin habitat
customer_reviews.text: Great for my guinea pigs log cabin habitat:) They wash well and they're durable. They shouldn't be used with aspen shavings as the shavings stick. There is affordable corn cob litter that works well. Note: read the ingredients before purchasing litter. There is a brand that says it's natural, but includes an overwhelming chemically based scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for soft places already.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product but the blankets are best put on couches or soft beds. They are not very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Edy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very small
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is great. Good quality and soft. I must have missed the size, and that is my fault. These are not blankets unless you are using for kittens, cats or very small dogs. If you are good at sewing you could make 1 big blanket with all of the squares. They are cute.
customer_reviews.author: shellyt

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These are soft blankets. Not as thick as others but good value. I gave to our local dog rescue so I can’t speak to the durability or easiness to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppy folks!
customer_reviews.text: Great for putting in the puppy packs for my puppy buyers. I rub mama and babies down with it to deposit their scent, and it really makes a difference when the puppies go to their new homes with a comforting &and soft blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUPER soft and GREAT for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to actually use this product, however, upon receiving it, I’m super impressed. The blankets are decent sized for a small dog/pet(I’m using them for my future ferret). The price is hard to beat, especially for getting 6 of them! And overall, I’m satisfied. Again, I have yet to use/wash them, and durability might end up being an issue for something long term just based on the soft/thinner fabric. But for cuddle blankets and soft bedding, they will work great for my future fur baby!
customer_reviews.author: Arden9876

customer_reviews.title: Thin but as the photo depicts.
customer_reviews.text: White blanket has a hole in it the size of a nickel. Disappointed because can’t use the entire piece. Using them to make fleece coats for small dogs and puppies. Colors are as the photo depicts. They are very thin so need to double it up in thickness to be warm.
customer_reviews.author: Richard a Mott jr

customer_reviews.title: CM not Inches. They're tiny and thin.
customer_reviews.text: In all fairness I should have read the dimensions I anticipated inches and not centimeters, they are the size of two average placemats and very thin. Womp-womp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adorable fleeces
customer_reviews.text: We loved these for our piggies' cage. They came quickly and were super cute
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: SOFT
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and "snuggly". They are not large but they are softer than most larger blankets....I put one on top of their beds and these are easy for the cats to " paw" into a comfy nest. Nice patterns too. "Kitties like variety"......
customer_reviews.author: Knitter36

customer_reviews.title: Loose stitching
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and opened to look at them. The stitching on the ends is very loose. Will easily get caught on our puppy's nails and/or other things. Will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves them
customer_reviews.text: They're lightweight so my furry dog doesnt get too hot with them. She chews them and they havent ripped yet so they appear to be durable as well. I like the assorted colors as well
customer_reviews.author: Thyler M.

customer_reviews.title: Thin, Stretchy Fleece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fleece to make dog toys out of. It is very stretchy and thus easy to manipulate, but also very easy to rip pieces off. When I am not careful my dog tears off little pieces that I have to run around and vacuum off the floor. The print on them is nice, I'll probably buy some more at a later time.
customer_reviews.author: Kiros

customer_reviews.title: Lame
customer_reviews.text: These are tiny, flimsy and not worth the amount for the set. I use these as gifts with pups whn I rehome them and I was embarrassed by them.
customer_reviews.author: MoonGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and very soft
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Love the color variations and is perfect for my dogs bed. My dog loves it so much that he takes his blanket everywhere with him!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Missing 1 blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I only received 5 blankets and it was supposed to be a 6 pack. The package was open but it was in a box too. Luckily, I ordered 2 packs and have 11 puppies so I have the right number. I’m a breeder and these are going home with each puppy with moms scent on them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Varner

customer_reviews.title: Great pet blankets! Great company to work with!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Not for a dog....but for our cat. She lays on these soft blankets in various places throughout the house. The best place we use them in in her carrier when we have to travel or go to the vet. I love that we have several just in case and that we can use them in multiple ways. Good customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: TC-P

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my guinea pig cage, they are lovely and my piggies seem to love them as well. Well worth the money, easy to clean and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Cute blankets
customer_reviews.text: Loves his blankets. I think they are bery cute and colorful. Perfect size for my chihuahua
customer_reviews.author: sharon miz

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and smaller then expected. Holes in red one after 1st wash . Never was used just washed . Will work for my needs as I am using them as cage liners for my guinea pigs .
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Small but does the job
customer_reviews.text: These fleece "blankets" are a bit small for any dog. Mine are small mini dachshunds so it all worked out. I will say that these are slightly bigger than a dish towel but they do the job. You'll have to give your dog a couple and he'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: jbx2usa

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifts
customer_reviews.text: I just adore these little dog blankets. They are perfectly rolled up and fit snuggly into a box for shipping gifts. Fabric is soft and cozy. Great gift for any fur friend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great set of blankies!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, can’t beat the price for this set of blankets. Great for puppies, small and medium sized pets.
customer_reviews.author: MaSher

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Super thin, odors cling, and several already have holes from the wash. One of my least favorite purchase on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Galante

customer_reviews.title: Not a good toy, only for snuggling
customer_reviews.text: It is priced right (cheap) because the quality is low. I thought my dog could use these as a play thing like she has with other blankets, but the quality is too low, she tore them up in less than a day. Probably a good blanket for small dogs wanting something to snuggle on though.
customer_reviews.author: Spotstephanie

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because I needed blankets that could be washed at least once a week. They won't even stand up to one washing. The stitches are already falling out. Im sending them back. No good!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Threading is bad!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought two of these for the first time. I love these blankets as I do have a chihuahua. But am extremely disappointed when I opened them and the threading was all messy and coming out of the blankets. Not sure if I’ll buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, poor quality fabric. Even folded three times, not much there. I purchased the blankets to donate to my local “no kill”animal shelter, but I’m embarrassed to take them.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Soft and washable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I bought them to put in my kitty's beds because I was sick of trying to vacuum the beds. This way, I can just put these in the beds, and wash them as needed. Beds stay like new. She loves them because they're so soft and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Stienkuller

customer_reviews.title: Warm & soft
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of these pet blankets, colors & price. They are soft and warm for my little chihuahua.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough blankets for chewy puppies
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Great Dane puppy has had these for two months, and only one is fraying. For price, they are a good buy. They are smaller in size, so large breeds will outgrow, but my intent was to give blankets as a puppy and allow him something to destroy other than furniture. Job complete!
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: So Useful
customer_reviews.text: These small, soft blankets are great. I use them in the crate, the playpen, and her carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Strong!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase!! I use these blankets in my puppy’s crate instead of the white “crate beds”. My puppy tears at the white beds then chokes on the cottony fluff. These blankets are soft and strong. Even when he tears at them, nothing comes off that will choke him.
customer_reviews.author: Daahnie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Warm Pet Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: These soft and warm blankets are purr-fect for covering up my kitty when she falls asleep. She also likes to sleep on top of the blankets when I have them laid out on top of the sofa. They are pretty lightweight, but will keep your pet cat or dog warm during their naps! Also, the little pawprints print and multi-colors of these fleece blankets are so cute! :)
customer_reviews.author: JS

product_meta.title: Comsmart Warm Paw Print Blanket/Bed Cover for Dogs and Cats
feature_bullets: An ideal bedding for pet carriers, beds and nest; Also perfect for sofa or car seats to stop from scratching or shedding.
Suitable for every season and many situations, such as warm blanket, mat pad, bath towel, picnic blanket and so on.
Made by double-sided fleece material, not so heavy but in good warmth, also ultra soft with comfortable touching.
Cute blanket with paw print; 6 pack of the black, brown, blue grey,red and white one, you can change and wash anytime as you like.
The size is 24x28 Inches, suit for Pet up to 18 lbs which is not too big or too small for your pets, such as kitties, puppies and many other small animals. Just the right size.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
